**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- Identical feathers radiate from the center of this spellheart, held in place by woven straw. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +8, and the spell DC is 18.
  • **Armor** You gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks and resistance 2 to falling damage.
  • **Weapon** After you cast an [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) spell by Activating the wreath, you can Fly 5 feet as a single action, or you can Fly 10 feet as a free action if the spell you cast wasn't a cantrip. This must be your next action, and if you don't have a fly Speed, you must end the flight on solid ground or fall.
Five-Feather Wreath **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 1.1 **Price** 90 gp Five-Feather Wreath (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 1.1 **Price** 425 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 5, fly distance affixed to a weapon casting a non-cantrip spell is 25 feet, the spell attack roll is +14, and spell DC is 24. Five-Feather Wreath (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 1.1 **Price** 1,750 gp --- Bonus affixed to armor is +2, resistance when affixed to armor is 10, fly distance affixed to a weapon casting a non-cantrip spell is 40 feet, spell attack roll is +19, and spell DC is 29.
